env_local: marine pelagic feature [ENVO:01000044];marine water body [ENVO:00001999];costal water body [ENVO:02000049]
organization: Interdisciplinary Centre of Marine and Environmental Research
extra_site_info: This site participated in OSD2014, OSD2015 and OSD2016 during MicroB3 project and in OSD 2018 during ASSEMBLE Plus. This is a station located in the mouth of the Douro Estuary, with annual phytoplankton blooms occurring during spring. In this area there are several recreation and fishing activities.
